"]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"request_id": "858718fc9b22a325-FCO", "timestamp_": "absolute", "message_type": null}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "24620bc4-91f9-4619-8d4b-4710b67a2a81", "children": ["2efef252-9cc5-48cb-8b31-51f09a9ddefe"]}, "2efef252-9cc5-48cb-8b31-51f09a9ddefe": {"id": "2efef252-9cc5-48cb-8b31-51f09a9ddefe", "message": {"id": "2efef252-9cc5-48cb-8b31-51f09a9ddefe", "author": {"role": "assistant", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1708435780.775756, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["Socrates did encounter individuals who were defensive, resistant to questioning, or primarily focused on proving themselves right. In his dialogues, particularly those written by Plato, Socrates navigates these situations with a nuanced approach. Here are a few strategies he employed:\n\n1. **Irony and Humility:**\n   - Socrates often presented himself as ignorant and approached discussions with a sense of humility. By doing so, he disarmed the defensiveness of others, creating a space for open dialogue. He would claim to be on a shared quest for knowledge, emphasizing that both parties could learn from each other.\n\n2. **Guiding Questions:**\n   - Socratic questioning involves guiding individuals to reconsider their beliefs through a series of well-crafted questions. While some may initially resist, persistent and skillful questioning can prompt self-reflection and a deeper examination of one&#x27;s own assumptions.\n\n3. **Philosophical Midwifery:**\n   - Socrates used the metaphor of &quot;philosophical midwifery&quot; to describe his role. He saw himself as helping others give birth to their ideas. This gentle approach allowed individuals to feel less threatened and more willing to explore their beliefs.\n\n4. **Exposing Contradictions:**\n   - Socrates had a keen ability to highlight contradictions in the beliefs or arguments of others. By gently pointing out inconsistencies, he encouraged individuals to reassess their positions.\n\n5. **Appealing to the Greater Good:**\n   - Socrates often steered discussions toward the pursuit of virtue, wisdom, and the greater good. By framing the quest for truth in a broader, shared context, he sought to align the conversation with common values.\n\nIt&#x27;s important to note that while Socratic questioning can be powerful, it may not always lead to a change of heart or mind, especially if someone is deeply entrenched in their beliefs. Socrates acknowledged the limitations of his method and the fact that some individuals may resist self-examination.\n\nIn our novel, we can explore these dynamics through characters who embody different approaches to truth-seeking and engage in dialogues that reflect the challenges and rewards of philosophical inquiry."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"finish_details": {"type": "stop", "stop_tokens": [100260]}, "citations": [], "gizmo_id": null, "is_complete": true, "message_type": null, "model_slug": "text-davinci-002-render-sha", "parent_id": "aaa27f9d-d992-4201-ae7c-9b0fd97b6c70", "request_id": "858718fc9b22a325-FCO", "timestamp_": "absolute"}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "aaa27f9d-d992-4201-ae7c-9b0fd97b6c70", "children": ["aaa2b2a3-f81b-4bd5-bf03-1571b2728938"]}, "aaa2b2a3-f81b-4bd5-bf03-1571b2728938": {"id": "aaa2b2a3-f81b-4bd5-bf03-1571b2728938", "message": {"id": "aaa2b2a3-f81b-4bd5-bf03-1571b2728938", "author": {"role": "user", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1708436045.704438, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["I was thinking about how one can tell if they live in an oppressive society. how one can judge if their society is actually free. "]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"request_id": "858720004bb9a264-FCO", "timestamp_": "absolute", "message_type": null}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "2efef252-9cc5-48cb-8b31-51f09a9ddefe", "children": ["5c395f59-d07b-4aca-8c67-e49ae58a3c5b"]}, "5c395f59-d07b-4aca-8c67-e49ae58a3c5b": {"id": "5c395f59-d07b-4aca-8c67-e49ae58a3c5b", "message": {"id": "5c395f59-d07b-4aca-8c67-e49ae58a3c5b", "author": {"role": "assistant", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1708436065.84701, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["Yes, there have been numerous scholars and thinkers who have explored the relationship between freedom, equality, and societal structures, especially in the context of capitalism. Here are a few perspectives:\n\n1. **Karl Marx:**\n   - Marx, a foundational figure in the critique of capitalism, argued that capitalist societies are inherently marked by class struggle and exploitation. He emphasized economic structures as central to shaping societal dynamics. According to Marx, true freedom requires the elimination of class distinctions and the establishment of a classless, communist society.\n\n2. **John Stuart Mill:**\n   - Mill, a classical liberal philosopher, contributed to the development of liberal political thought. In his work &quot;On Liberty,&quot; he discussed the importance of individual freedom, emphasizing that society should only restrict individual actions to prevent harm to others. Mill&#x27;s ideas influenced discussions on the balance between individual liberty and societal well-being.\n\n3. **John Rawls:**\n   - Rawls, a contemporary political philosopher, proposed the concept of &quot;justice as fairness&quot; in his influential work &quot;A Theory of Justice.&quot; He explored the idea of a just society as one that individuals would agree to behind a &quot;veil of ignorance,&quot; where they wouldn&#x27;t know their own social or economic position. Rawls argued for social and economic inequalities that benefit the least advantaged.\n\n4. **Amartya Sen:**\n   - Sen, an economist and philosopher, expanded the understanding of freedom beyond just political liberties. In his capability approach, Sen argued that freedom should be seen in terms of the capabilities individuals have to lead the kind of lives they value. This includes factors like health, education, and social opportunities.\n\n5. **Michel Foucault:**\n   - Foucault, a postmodernist thinker, examined the relationship between power and knowledge. He explored how societal structures, including economic systems, shape and regulate individuals. Foucault&#x27;s work invites reflection on how power operates in various institutions, influencing notions of freedom and equality.\n\nIn the context of our novel, characters could engage in philosophical dialogues or experiences that reflect these diverse perspectives. "]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"request_id": "85891da69b9474e6-FCO", "timestamp_": "absolute", "message_type": null}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "9f071d71-2ce7-48e2-9c61-dd035ec9c21a", "children": ["f0daebe0-14ef-459c-a5a8-561eb500fcb6"]}, "f0daebe0-14ef-459c-a5a8-561eb500fcb6": {"id": "f0daebe0-14ef-459c-a5a8-561eb500fcb6", "message": {"id": "f0daebe0-14ef-459c-a5a8-561eb500fcb6", "author": {"role": "assistant", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1708456933.566563, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["If all the farms in the world were converted into forests, and humanity were to rely on a hunter-gatherer lifestyle, several challenges would arise. While it&#x27;s an intriguing hypothetical scenario, sustaining the current global population through traditional hunter-gatherer methods faces significant obstacles:\n\n1. **Population Density:** Hunter-gatherer societies typically require large expanses of land to sustain a relatively small population. The Earth&#x27;s current population density is much higher than what traditional hunter-gatherer lifestyles could support.\n\n2. **Resource Depletion:** Large-scale hunting and gathering by a global population would put immense pressure on available resources. Over-harvesting, deforestation, and depletion of wildlife populations could lead to resource scarcity.\n\n3. **Distribution Challenges:** Hunter-gatherer societies rely on the natural distribution of resources. In a world with uneven geographical distribution of ecosystems, some regions might struggle to support populations due to limited biodiversity and resources.\n\n4. **Modern Dependency:** The transition from agriculture to a hunter-gatherer lifestyle would be a massive societal shift. Modern infrastructure, technology, and dependencies on agriculture-derived products pose challenges to such a transition.\n\n5. **Cultural Adaptation:** The shift from an interconnected global society to small, dispersed groups would require significant cultural adaptation. Humans have become accustomed to settled lifestyles, complex social structures, and technology.\n\nIn summary, while the idea of a return to a hunter-gatherer lifestyle is intriguing, the current global population and societal structure make it impractical. The challenges of sustaining a large population without modern agricultural practices would likely lead to resource depletion and widespread difficulties in meeting basic needs."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"finish_details": {"type": "stop", "stop_tokens": [100260]}, "citations": [], "gizmo_id": null, "is_complete": true, "message_type": null, "model_slug": "text-davinci-002-render-sha", "parent_id": "aaa26622-e692-4b03-b969-8a7f7a1b050e", "request_id": "85891da69b9474e6-FCO", "timestamp_": "absolute"}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "aaa26622-e692-4b03-b969-8a7f7a1b050e", "children": ["aaa21aca-2ac3-4b81-a2b0-ba4c81bf0d79"]}, "aaa21aca-2ac3-4b81-a2b0-ba4c81bf0d79": {"id": "aaa21aca-2ac3-4b81-a2b0-ba4c81bf0d79", "message": {"id": "aaa21aca-2ac3-4b81-a2b0-ba4c81bf0d79", "author": {"role": "user", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1708652733.654735, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["For some reason this chat moves really slow now and we often have errors, I think because it&#x27;s too long. Preheat your oven to 350\u00b0F (175\u00b0C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly grease it.\n\n2. In a mixing bowl, combine the flour, oats, hemp seeds, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt. Set aside.\n\n3. In a separate large bowl, cream together the softened butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar until light and fluffy.\n\n4. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract until well combined.\n\n5. Gradually add the dry ingredient mixture to the wet ingredients, mixing well after each addition. If desired, fold in chocolate chips or raisins.\n\n6. Using a tablespoon or cookie scoop, drop rounded portions of dough onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing them about 2 inches apart.\n\n7. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges turn golden brown.\n\n8. Remove the cookies from the oven and allow them to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.\n\n9. Once cooled, your hemp-infused oatmeal cookies are ready to be enjoyed! Store them in an airtight container for freshness.\n\nRemember, if you&#x27;re infusing the cookies with hemp-derived CBD oil or any other hemp-infused ingredient, be sure to follow the recommended dosage guidelines provided with the product and consider any personal preferences or dietary restrictions. "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1684077053.700347, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["To make oatmeal cookies with hemp plant, you can use hemp seeds or hemp protein powder as an ingredient. Here&#x27;s a simple recipe for hemp-infused oatmeal cookies:\n\nIngredients:\n- 1 cup rolled oats\n- 1 cup all-purpose flour\n- 1/2 cup hemp seeds or 1/4 cup hemp protein powder\n- 1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened\n- 1/2 cup brown sugar\n- 1/4 cup granulated sugar\n- 1 large egg\n- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract\n- 1/2 teaspoon baking soda\n- 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon\n- 1/4 teaspoon salt\n- Optional: 1/2 cup chocolate chips, raisins, or chopped nuts for added flavor\n\nInstructions:\n\n1. Preheat your oven to 350\u00b0F (175\u00b0C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.\n\n2. In a mixing bowl, combine the softened butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar. Mix well until creamy and smooth.\n\n3. Add the egg and vanilla extract to the butter-sugar mixture. Beat until well combined.\n\n4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the rolled oats, all-purpose flour, hemp seeds or hemp protein powder, baking soda, ground cinnamon, and salt.\n\n5. Gradually add the dry ingredient mixture to the wet ingredients, mixing until the dough forms. If desired, stir in chocolate chips, raisins, or nuts at this stage.\n\n6. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing them about 2 inches apart. Flatten each cookie slightly with the back of a spoon or your hand.\n\n7. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for approximately 10-12 minutes, or until the edges turn golden brown.\n\n8. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the cookies cool for a few minutes on the sheet before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.\n\n9. Once cooled, enjoy your homemade hemp-infused oatmeal cookies!\n\nRemember to consume these cookies responsibly, and if you have any specific dietary concerns or health conditions, consult a medical professional before incorporating hemp into your recipes."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"message_type": null, "model_slug": "text-davinci-002-render-sha", "finish_details": {"type": "stop", "stop": "&lt;|diff_marker|&gt;"}, "timestamp_": "absolute"}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "aaa237ee-a58a-43d2-aad9-961d528254f2", "children": ["aaa2cfdf-b570-47c4-b71c-86d54043e6a8"]}, "aaa2cfdf-b570-47c4-b71c-86d54043e6a8": {"id": "aaa2cfdf-b570-47c4-b71c-86d54043e6a8", "message": {"id": "aaa2cfdf-b570-47c4-b71c-86d54043e6a8", "author": {"role": "user", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1684077059.97954, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["Can you put marijuana directly into oatmeal cookies? Here&#x27;s a recipe for marijuana-infused oatmeal cookies, also known as &quot;edibles&quot;:\n\nNote: Before proceeding, please be aware that consuming marijuana edibles can have potent effects, and it&#x27;s important to use them responsibly and in accordance with local laws. Additionally, the potency of the infused cookies will depend on the strength of the marijuana used, so adjust the dosage according to your preference and tolerance.\n\nIngredients:\n- 1 cup unsalted butter\n- 1 cup granulated sugar\n- 1 cup brown sugar\n- 2 large eggs\n- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract\n- 2 cups all-purpose flour\n- 1 teaspoon baking soda\n- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon\n- 1/2 teaspoon salt\n- 2 cups old-fashioned oats\n- 1 cup chopped nuts (optional)\n- 1 cup chocolate chips (optional)\n- 1/4 to 1/2 cup marijuana-infused butter or oil (adjust based on desired potency)\n\nInstructions:\n\n1. Preheat your oven to 350\u00b0F (175\u00b0C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.\n\n2. In a mixing bowl, cream together the unsalted butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until smooth and creamy.\n\n3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla extract.\n\n4. In a separate bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, baking soda, ground cinnamon, and salt.\n\n5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.\n\n6. Fold in the oats, nuts (if using), and chocolate chips (if using).\n\n7. Gently melt the marijuana-infused butter or oil over low heat until it becomes liquid.\n\n8. Stir the marijuana-infused butter or oil into the cookie dough until evenly distributed. Adjust the amount used based on the desired dosage.\n\n9. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing them about 2 inches apart.\n\n10. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for approximately 10-12 minutes, or until the edges turn golden brown.\n\n11. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the cookies cool for a few minutes on the sheet before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.\n\nOnce cooled, your marijuana-infused oatmeal cookies are ready to enjoy. Remember to start with a small portion and wait for the effects to kick in before consuming more, as the potency can vary. Store any remaining cookies in an airtight container."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"message_type": null, "model_slug": "text-davinci-002-render-sha", "finish_details": {"type": "stop", "stop": "&lt;|diff_marker|&gt;"}, "timestamp_": "absolute"}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "aaa2cfdf-b570-47c4-b71c-86d54043e6a8", "children": ["aaa29565-d082-48d6-ad07-2f11cd0e571b"]}, "aaa29565-d082-48d6-ad07-2f11cd0e571b": {"id": "aaa29565-d082-48d6-ad07-2f11cd0e571b", "message": {"id": "aaa29565-d082-48d6-ad07-2f11cd0e571b", "author": {"role": "user", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1693618410.958418, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["do you remember my  resume? shared journey. Here are some friendly tips:**\n\n1. **Open Channels**: Select channels that resonate with your team. It could be virtual meetings, chats, or even a dedicated platform.\n\n2. **Face-to-Face Wins**: Encourage face-to-face interactions. Whether in-person or through video calls, the personal touch matters.\n\n3. **Plan Long-Term**: Craft a communication plan that&#x27;s not just for today but for the future. Consistency builds trust and rapport.\n\n4. **Get Creative**: Inject fun into your messages. Memes, gifs, or emojis can add a touch of personality and make your communications more relatable.\n\n5. **One-on-One Moments**: Regular one-to-one sessions with team members create an atmosphere of trust. Discuss goals, challenges, and successes.\n\n6. **Show, Don&#x27;t Just Tell**: Use body language, even in virtual settings. A smile, nod, or positive gestures can convey sincerity and warmth.\n\nRemember, effective communication is a blend of strategy and heart. These ideas aim to make the workplace not just efficient but a community where everyone feels heard and valued.\n\n*Sources:*\n1. [Your Thought Partner - Two-Way Communication Tips](https://www.yourthoughtpartner.com/blog/two-way-communication)\n2. "]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"request_id": "8544f6136ebfa265-FCO", "timestamp_": "absolute", "message_type": null}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "188c4d53-8c62-4322-80de-731d35441a51", "children": ["77a1dc7d-dd61-4682-af40-c753042dd30f"]}, "77a1dc7d-dd61-4682-af40-c753042dd30f": {"id": "77a1dc7d-dd61-4682-af40-c753042dd30f", "message": {"id": "77a1dc7d-dd61-4682-af40-c753042dd30f", "author": {"role": "assistant", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1707742286.055015, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["When embedding an image in an HTML email and the image is stored locally on your computer, you&#x27;ll need to convert the image to a data URI and include it directly in the HTML. A data URI is a base64-encoded representation of the image that can be embedded directly in the HTML.\n\nHere&#x27;s how you can modify the HTML to include a locally stored image using a data URI:\n\n1. Convert the image to base64: You can use online tools or command-line tools to convert your image to base64. For example, you can use the following command in a terminal:\n\n   ```bash\n   base64 your_image.jpg\n   ```\n\n   Replace `your_image.jpg` with the actual filename of your image.\n\n2. Copy the base64-encoded string.\n\n3. Update the HTML:\n\n```html\n&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;\n&lt;html lang=&quot;en&quot;&gt;\n\n&lt;head&gt;\n  &lt;meta charset=&quot;UTF-8&quot;&gt;\n  &lt;meta name=&quot;viewport&quot; content=&quot;width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0&quot;&gt;\n  &lt;title&gt;Alexis Lindsay - Resume&lt;/title&gt;\n  &lt;style&gt;\n    body {\n      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\n      line-height: 1.6;\n      max-width: 800px;\n      margin: 20px auto;\n      padding: 0 20px;\n    }\n\n    h2 {\n      color: #333;\n    }\n\n    h3 {\n      color: #555;\n    }\n\n    ul {\n      list-style-type: none;\n      padding: 0;\n    }\n\n    li {\n      margin-bottom: 8px;\n    }\n\n    hr {\n      border: 1px solid #ddd;\n      margin: 20px 0;\n    }\n  &lt;/style&gt;\n&lt;/head&gt;\n\n&lt;body&gt;\n\n  &lt;!-- Picture Placeholder (Replace with actual image link or use img tag) --&gt;\n  &lt;div style=&quot;text-align: center;&quot;&gt;\n    &lt;img src=&quot;data:image/jpeg;base64,YourBase64StringHere&quot; alt=&quot;Alexis Lindsay&quot; style=&quot;max-width: 30%; border-radius: 50%;&quot;&gt;\n  &lt;/div&gt;\n\n  &lt;!-- Contact Information --&gt;\n  &lt;h2&gt;Alexis Lindsay&lt;/h2&gt;\n  &lt;p&gt;\n    \ud83d\udcde +39 331.265.9672 | \ud83d\udcde +1 904.385.0429 | \ud83d\udce7 alexislindsay@yahoo.com\n  &lt;/p&gt;\n\n  &lt;hr&gt;\n\n  &lt;!-- ... (Rest of the content remains the same) --&gt;\n\n&lt;/body&gt;\n\n&lt;/html&gt;\n```\n\nReplace `&quot;YourBase64StringHere&quot;` with the actual base64-encoded string of your image. Keep in mind that using data URIs for large images can increase the size of your HTML file, so it&#x27;s generally recommended for smaller images."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"finish_details": {"type": "stop", "stop_tokens": [100260]}, "citations": [], "gizmo_id": null, "is_complete": true, "message_type": null, "model_slug": "text-davinci-002-render-sha", "parent_id": "aaa2a32e-7332-4a4b-aad8-d786ff7566fb", "request_id": "8544f6136ebfa265-FCO", "timestamp_": "absolute"}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "aaa2a32e-7332-4a4b-aad8-d786ff7566fb", "children": ["aaa24fdf-5395-4b6d-8f5e-153742b3b6ad"]}, "aaa24fdf-5395-4b6d-8f5e-153742b3b6ad": {"id": "aaa24fdf-5395-4b6d-8f5e-153742b3b6ad", "message": {"id": "aaa24fdf-5395-4b6d-8f5e-153742b3b6ad", "author": {"role": "user", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1707742415.681429, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["Also I want this line:   &lt;h2&gt;Alexis Lindsay&lt;/h2&gt;  centered under the picture. "]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"request_id": "854514b4e83b74ec-FCO", "timestamp_": "absolute", "message_type": null}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "d1f10ea9-24c5-4016-af39-a5f7da4cbd44", "children": ["444e0a54-3b1f-4afe-bb0f-7f4086227a1d"]}, "444e0a54-3b1f-4afe-bb0f-7f4086227a1d": {"id": "444e0a54-3b1f-4afe-bb0f-7f4086227a1d", "message": {"id": "444e0a54-3b1f-4afe-bb0f-7f4086227a1d", "author": {"role": "assistant", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1707743537.7608, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["Sending a resume as an embedded page in an email can have both advantages and considerations. Here are some points to consider:\n\n**Advantages:**\n\n1. **Visual Appeal:** An embedded HTML page allows for a visually appealing and well-formatted presentation of your resume. This can make a positive first impression and showcase your attention to detail.\n\n2. **Consistent Formatting:** Embedding the resume ensures that the formatting remains consistent, regardless of the recipient&#x27;s device or email client.\n\n3. **Interactive Elements:** You can include interactive elements such as hyperlinks, buttons, or collapsible sections, enhancing the overall user experience.\n\n4. **Tracking:** Depending on the method used for embedding, you may have the ability to track whether the recipient opened or interacted with your resume.\n\n**Considerations:**\n\n1. **Compatibility:** Not all email clients or devices may render HTML content consistently. Some clients may strip or block certain HTML and CSS elements, leading to a loss of formatting.\n\n2. **File Size:** Large HTML files can increase the email size, leading to longer loading times and potential issues for recipients with slower internet connections.\n\n3. **Security:** Some email clients may treat embedded HTML content as a potential security risk, and users may need to enable external content to view it.\n\n4. **Recipient Preferences:** Some recipients prefer traditional, attached PDF or Word documents. An embedded page might be seen as unconventional.\n\n5. **Mobile Optimization:** Ensure that the embedded HTML is mobile-friendly, as many users check emails on their mobile devices.\n\n**Tips:**\n\n- **Testing:** Test the embedded HTML in different email clients to ensure compatibility and proper rendering.\n\n- **Fallback Option:** Consider including a link or attachment (PDF or Word) as a fallback option for users who may prefer traditional formats or face issues with the embedded content.\n\n- **Plain Text Version:** Include a plain text version of your resume in the email body for recipients who might have HTML rendering disabled.\n\nOverall, while an embedded HTML page can be visually appealing and showcase your skills, it&#x27;s essential to be mindful of potential limitations and recipient preferences. Providing alternative formats or attachments ensures flexibility for recipients with varying preferences and technical environments."]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": true, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"finish_details": {"type": "stop", "stop_tokens": [100260]}, "citations": [], "gizmo_id": null, "is_complete": true, "message_type": null, "model_slug": "text-davinci-002-render-sha", "parent_id": "aaa26c53-1c15-473c-adce-0560c19b0288", "request_id": "854514b4e83b74ec-FCO", "timestamp_": "absolute"}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "aaa26c53-1c15-473c-adce-0560c19b0288", "children": ["aaa277a2-6325-4163-a6c7-4290016fa15e"]}, "aaa277a2-6325-4163-a6c7-4290016fa15e": {"id": "aaa277a2-6325-4163-a6c7-4290016fa15e", "message": {"id": "aaa277a2-6325-4163-a6c7-4290016fa15e", "author": {"role": "user", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1707743678.097234, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["what if I sent it as an attached HTML document? Here are some considerations for sending your resume as an attached HTML document:\n\n**Advantages:**\n\n1. **Familiarity:** Sending an attached HTML document is a familiar practice, and most email clients can handle it without issues.\n\n2. **Consistency:** The recipient can download and view the resume using a web browser, ensuring consistent rendering across different platforms.\n\n3. **Ease of Download:** Users can easily download the HTML file for offline viewing or sharing.\n\n4. **Compatibility:** HTML files as attachments are generally more compatible with various email clients and devices compared to embedded HTML.\n\n**Considerations:**\n\n1. **Recipient Awareness:** Ensure that the recipient is aware that the attached file is an HTML document. Keep the file size reasonable for quick downloads and to avoid potential issues with email providers that limit attachment sizes.\n\n3. **Responsive Design:** Make sure that the HTML document is responsive and displays well on different devices, including mobile phones.\n\n4. **Link to Online Version:** Consider including a link within the email body that directs the recipient to an online version of your resume for quick access.\n\n5. **Testing:** Test the attached HTML document in different web browsers to ensure compatibility and proper rendering.\n\n**Tips:**\n\n- **Include a PDF Version:** Alongside the HTML attachment, consider attaching a PDF version of your resume. Our diverse client and applicant base, standards of excellence and nationwide network ensures we offer the medical community the resources needed to consistently achieve their goals. To know more about us please visit our website: https://www.medicalrecruitmentstrategies.com/\n\nWe are thrilled to inform you about an exciting job opportunity for the position of Analyst I - Finance Registration - Remote\n\nPosition Summary:\nThe Finance Registration team works in an exciting fast-paced environment where every single day is rarely the same as the previous. We highly value excellent customer service and aim to deliver on all of our commitments. The team is responsible for the financial registration of our PBM clients\u2019 contractual terms, which means we are critical to the achievement of the financial goals set by the organization.\n\n\nDuties:\n\nA successful candidate will display curiosity, creativity and technical acumen, which will allow them to research data while finding process efficiencies along the way. The candidate must be able to work individually, as part of a team, and across departments to deliver on key enterprise initiatives. They must have impeccable attention to detail as any errors can have downstream client impact. The ideal candidate will have experience with Excel and understand basic formulas and how to utilize Excel for data management. They will be expected to master applications used for successful implementations such as SAP, AS400, and various applications within Salesforce. The candidate must also assist team members with client requests and ensure they are processed accurately and completed in a timely manner. They will work with clients and internal business partners on requests and/or issues related to clients&#x27; financial setup and take lead on resolving their inquiries. ["One of the things about Obama being president that was precious to me was that I felt he was recognizably Black, so I felt represented. I saw his wife and children, and I felt their story aligned with a common narrative about Black people achieving great things with intelligence, hard work, and dedication. He seemed a natural addition to my Black History Month studies, so to speak.\n\nHowever, when I see Kamala Harris displaying indications of Blackness, I sometimes feel it might be performative. What makes Kamala&#x27;s displays different than Obama&#x27;s? Could it be a combination of sexism and colorism within the Black community? Have we not fully embraced her, while Obama may have benefited from biases within our community, such as patriarchy and colorism that prioritize the contributions of men over women? The core question is, what makes Kamala Harris&#x27;s displays of Blackness questionable? Why is there a feeling that it&#x27;s performative to gain and solidify the Black vote?\n\nTo find answers, it&#x27;s best to start by juxtaposing the history of these two individuals. Who were their family members, and which adult figures shaped their world view? Next, we should examine their educational background and professional history. What steps led them to be in the White House or White House adjacent? What do they stand for, and how do their attitudes toward domestic and international politics differ?\n\nFinally, how do they present themselves? Do both have charisma? Do they both portray themselves as earnest, altruistic, hardworking public servants? Or is comparing President Barack Obama and Vice-President Kamala Harris like comparing apples to oranges? Is the public perception of the performative nature of Vice President Kamala Harris&#x27;s &#x27;blackness&#x27; merely a reflection of our own biases and prejudices? I&#x27;m not sure we can ever be certain, but the facts remain as they are. It is what it is.     \n\n**Family Background and Upbringing**\n\nBarack Obama was born to a Kenyan father and an American mother. He was largely raised by his maternal grandparents in Hawaii, with intermittent periods spent with his mother in Indonesia. His father&#x27;s absence in his life was a significant influence, shaping his worldview and inspiring his memoir, &quot;Dreams from My Father.&quot;\n\nKamala Harris, on the other hand, is the daughter of immigrants, a Jamaican father and an Indian mother. She was raised in Oakland, California, in a household steeped in civil rights activism. Her mother, a breast cancer researcher, was a significant influence, instilling in Harris a strong sense of purpose and a commitment to public service.\n\n**Education and Professional History**\n\nObama studied political science at Columbia University and later graduated from Harvard Law School. He worked as a community organizer in Chicago before serving in the Illinois State Senate and the U.S. Senate. His path to the White House was marked by his historic keynote address at the 2004 Democratic National Convention, which catapulted him into the national spotlight.\n\nHarris studied political science and economics at Howard University, a historically black university, and earned her law degree from the University of California, Hastings. She served as the District Attorney of San Francisco and the Attorney General of California before being elected to the U.S. Senate. Her prosecutorial style and advocacy for criminal justice reform were key aspects of her political identity.\n\n**Political Stances and Public Image**\n\nBoth Obama and Harris have championed progressive policies, including healthcare reform, climate change, and civil rights. However, their political stances have been shaped by their unique experiences and the roles they&#x27;ve held. Obama&#x27;s presidency was marked by efforts to stimulate economic recovery following the Great Recession and to improve access to healthcare through the Affordable Care Act. Harris, as a senator and now vice president, has focused on criminal justice reform, women&#x27;s rights, and income inequality.\n\nIn terms of public image, both are seen as charismatic and dedicated public servants. However, their charisma manifests differently. Obama&#x27;s charisma is often associated with his eloquence and ability to inspire, while Harris&#x27;s is linked to her assertiveness and dynamic presence.\n\n**Conclusion**\n\nComparing Obama and Harris is indeed like comparing apples to oranges. Each has a unique background, career trajectory, and public image. The perception of Harris&#x27;s &#x27;blackness&#x27; as performative could be influenced by societal biases, including sexism and colorism. It&#x27;s also possible that the differences in their upbringing and cultural experiences contribute to these perceptions. Ultimately, understanding these nuances can help us challenge our biases and appreciate the multifaceted identities of these public figures.\n\n**Sources:**\n1. His journey, coupled with the visible presence of his wife and children, seemed to align with a narrative of Black achievement through intelligence, hard work, and dedication. However, when examining Kamala Harris&#x27;s displays of Blackness, some may perceive it as performative, raising questions about the underlying factors contributing to this sentiment.\n\nThe comparison between Obama and Harris brings forth a complex interplay of factors, potentially influenced by sexism and colorism within the Black community. Has Harris faced a different reception due to biases ingrained in societal structures, where achievements by men may be prioritized over those by women? To delve into these questions, it is crucial to juxtapose the histories of these two prominent figures.\n\n**Family Background and Upbringing:**\n\nBarack Obama&#x27;s upbringing was marked by the absence of his Kenyan father, shaping his worldview and inspiring his memoir, &quot;Dreams from My Father.&quot; Kamala Harris, the daughter of Jamaican and Indian immigrants, grew up in Oakland, California, with a mother deeply involved in civil rights activism. Both backgrounds provide unique lenses through which they view the world.\n\n**Education and Professional History:**\n\nObama&#x27;s journey from Columbia University to Harvard Law School, followed by community organizing and political roles, culminated in his historic presidency. Harris, a Howard University graduate, pursued a path through law, serving as a prosecutor before ascending to the U.S. Senate. The differences in their professional trajectories contribute to their distinct political identities.\n\n**Political Stances and Public Image:**\n\nWhile both Obama and Harris champion progressive policies, their focuses diverge. Obama&#x27;s presidency centered on economic recovery and healthcare reform, whereas Harris, as a senator and vice president, emphasizes criminal justice reform and women&#x27;s rights. Their public images also differ, with Obama&#x27;s eloquence contrasting Harris&#x27;s assertiveness and dynamic presence.\n\n**The Perception of &#x27;Blackness&#x27; and Public Reception:**\n\nThe question of performative &#x27;blackness&#x27; surrounding Harris may stem from societal biases. Sexism and colorism could play roles in shaping public perception, raising the need for a nuanced understanding of the biases influencing these judgments. Harris&#x27;s identity and achievements may be viewed through a different lens compared to Obama&#x27;s, necessitating an examination of our own biases.\n\nIn conclusion, comparing Obama and Harris is akin to juxtaposing apples and oranges. Their unique backgrounds, career paths, and public images contribute to distinct perceptions. Try to say them as quickly and clearly as you can.\n\n   Example:\n   - &quot;Thirty-three thirsty thunderbirds thoughtfully thumped on the roof.&quot;\n\n2. **Word Match:**\n   I&#x27;ll say a pair of words, one with the &quot;th&quot; sound and one without. Your task is to identify the word with the &quot;th&quot; sound.\n\n   Example:\n   - Which one has the &quot;th&quot; sound: &quot;tree&quot; or &quot;three&quot;?\n\n3. **Story Challenge:**\n   I&#x27;ll start a simple story, and you continue by adding sentences. Try to include words with the &quot;th&quot; sound. Open your Google Sheets.\n2. Click on &quot;Extensions&quot; in the top menu.\n3. Choose &quot;Apps Script.&quot;\n4. Delete any code in the script editor and paste the provided script.\n5. "]}, "status": "finished_successfully", "end_turn": null, "weight": 1.0, "metadata": {"timestamp_": "absolute", "message_type": null}, "recipient": "all", "channel": null}, "parent": "7d2515de-600f-40b2-9223-4bd22c1b19b9", "children": ["92da8edb-78ed-4310-80ec-334f99dcc0eb"]}, "92da8edb-78ed-4310-80ec-334f99dcc0eb": {"id": "92da8edb-78ed-4310-80ec-334f99dcc0eb", "message": {"id": "92da8edb-78ed-4310-80ec-334f99dcc0eb", "author": {"role": "assistant", "name": null, "metadata": {}}, "create_time": 1703456881.583346, "update_time": null, "content": {"content_type": "text", "parts": ["31 is a card game that typically involves a central pot that players contribute to, and the goal is to reach a total of 31 points or as close to it as possible. Here are the basic rules:\n\n**Number of Players:**\n- 3 or more players.\n\n**Setup:**\n1. Use a standard 52-card deck.\n2. Each player is dealt three cards.\n\n**Objective:**\n- The goal is to have a hand value as close to 31 points as possible.\n\n**Card Values:**\n- Face cards (King, Queen, Jack) are worth 10 points.\n- Number cards are worth their face value.\n- Aces are worth 11 points.\n\n**Gameplay:**\n1. Players take turns in a clockwise direction.\n2. On your turn, you draw a card from the deck or the discard pile.\n3. After drawing, you discard a card, placing it face-up in the discard pile.\n\n**Scoring:**\n- The hand value is calculated by adding up the points of the three cards.\n- A perfect hand is 31 points (an Ace and two 10-point cards).\n\n**Knocking:**\n- If a player believes their hand is strong enough, they can &quot;knock&quot; during their turn instead of drawing. The round then proceeds to the next player.\n\n**End of Round:**\n- The round ends when a player knocks, or the draw pile is empty.\n- All players reveal their hands, and the player with the closest or equal to 31 points wins the round.\n\n**Scoring Points:**\n- The player with the best hand gets one point.\n- If a player has a &quot;Blitz&quot; (31 points) immediately upon being dealt their hand, they get two points.\n- If a player knocks and has the lowest hand value, they get one point.\n- If a player has three-of-a-kind, they get five points.\n\n**Winning:**\n- The game continues for a set number of rounds or until players decide to stop.\n- The player with the most points at the end is the winner.\n\nKeep in mind that house rules may vary, so it&#x27;s a good idea to establish
